author: Posted At Am On February
title: Say WHAT? Lindsay Lohan claims she was ‘racially profiled’ while traveling for wearing headscarf – twitchy.com
text:
Say WHAT? Lindsay Lohan claims she was ‘racially profiled’ while traveling for wearing headscarf Posted at 11:59 am on February 21, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Racially profiled? 
Not to be nitpicky but wouldn’t thinking only certain races of people wear headscarves make you a racist? 
It’s so hard to tell with today’s progressive brouhaha. 
Anyway, Lindsay Lohan seems to think she was racially profiled at Heathrow Airport because of a headscarf: Lindsay Lohan claims she was 'racially profiled' at Heathrow Airport while wearing a headscarf https://t.co/ASM9881R2P pic.twitter.com/8eIxBygMMe 
— Daily Mail Celebrity (@DailyMailCeleb) February 21, 2017 
No, we’re not making this up. 
Although she could be making it up … who knows. Trending 'What are y'all smokin'? Women's March champions menstrual equity, is mocked ruthlessly 
Per Lohan: 
‘When I was flying to New York recently. I was wearing a headscarf and I got stopped at the airport and was racially profiled for the first time in my life.’ 
Huh? Alrighty then. 
— Ó Scolaid Òg (@WeWhoDieSaluteU) February 21, 2017 
Apparently Headscarfian is a race we’ve never heard of before. @DailyMailCeleb anything for attention 
— bet (@betmartin1957) February 21, 2017 
Sadly this is probably more true than not. She can't get insured to star in a movie so now she's playing dress up to pretend she's being profiled and discriminated a/g? Sounds legit. https://t.co/mWKwUMRRdY
